#### About my name

Actually, my full name is Katarzyna Kedzierska, or Katarzyna Zofia Kedzierska (including my middle name). In Polish, we usually have a shorter version of a name that we go by and reserve the full legal name (here: Katarzyna) for official occasions, or when we get in trouble with our parents. Here you can find recordings on how to pronounce my shorter name: [Kasia](https://www.howtopronounce.com/kasia/30911273) or longer: [Katarzyna](https://www.howtopronounce.com/katarzyna/28825507).
:::
